task_text: [Vaccinology][Comparative-Analysis] Compare booster-dose rationale presented in the ACP and MDPI documents.

gold_end_state.summary: ACP discusses boosters in the context of waning immunity and expanding coverage strategies, while MDPI frames boosters based on immunogenicity data, variant-driven immune escape, and trial/post-marketing evidence; both support booster use when evidence shows improved protection or in response to variant threats.

quiz.question: Which evidence base is emphasized by MDPI for justifying boosters?
